channel.title: CVE Feed for Team Heateor -- Heateor Social Login WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Team Heateor -- Heateor Social Login WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-24712|2024-07-05T17:20:49.505Z -- team%20heateor -- heateor%20social%20login%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Team Heateor Heateor Social Login WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Heateor Social Login WordPress: from n/a through 1.1.30.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Team Heateor Heateor Social Login WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Heateor Social Login WordPress: from n/a through 1.1.30.
